description: This file contains data access layer functions for managing test runs, test cases, logs, and related statistics in a testing framework. It defines functions for creating, updating, and retrieving test run and test case data, interacting with SQLAlchemy ORM models.

methods.name: models.TestRun create_test_run( db: Session, project: Optional[str] = None, suite_name: Optional[str] = None, total_cases: int = 0, logs_path: Optional[str] = None, )
methods.description: Creates and persists a new TestRun with status 'running' in the database.

methods.name: Optional[models.TestRun] finalize_test_run( db: Session, run_id: int, status: str, passed: int, failed: int )
methods.description: Marks a TestRun as finished, updating status, end_time, and counts.

methods.name: models.TestCaseResult add_case_result( db: Session, run_id: int, case_name: str, status: str, duration_sec: Optional[float] = None, message: Optional[str] = None, suite_name: Optional[str] = None, start_time: Optional[datetime] = None, end_time: Optional[datetime] = None, tags: Optional[str] = None, )
methods.description: Creates and adds a TestCaseResult record linked to a specific test run.

methods.name: models.BatchLog add_batch_log( db: Session, run_id: int, message: str, level: str = "INFO", timestamp: Optional[datetime] = None, )
methods.description: Appends a batch log message for a test run.

methods.name: models.FailLog add_fail_log( db: Session, run_id: int, message: str, error_type: Optional[str] = None, case_result_id: Optional[int] = None, details: Optional[str] = None, )
methods.description: Appends a failure log entry, optionally linked to a specific test case result.

methods.name: List[models.TestRun] get_recent_runs(db: Session, limit: int = 20)
methods.description: Retrieves the most recent test runs ordered by start_time.

methods.name: Optional[Tuple[int,int,int]] get_run_stats(db: Session, run_id: int)
methods.description: Returns total cases, passed, and failed counts for a specific run.

methods.name: Tuple[int,int,int] count_case_status(db: Session, run_id: int)
methods.description: Computes and returns counts of passed, failed, and total test cases for a run.

ctags.name: add_batch_log
ctags.signature: ( db: Session, run_id: int, message: str, level: str = "INFO", timestamp: Optional[datetime] = None, )

ctags.name: add_case_result
ctags.signature: ( db: Session, run_id: int, case_name: str, status: str, duration_sec: Optional[float] = None, message: Optional[str] = None, suite_name: Optional[str] = None, start_time: Optional[datetime] = None, end_time: Optional[datetime] = None, tags: Optional[str] = None, )

ctags.name: add_fail_log
ctags.signature: ( db: Session, run_id: int, message: str, error_type: Optional[str] = None, case_result_id: Optional[int] = None, details: Optional[str] = None, )

ctags.name: count_case_status
ctags.pattern: /^def count_case_status(db: Session, run_id: int) -> Tuple[int, int, int]:$/

ctags.name: create_test_run
ctags.signature: ( db: Session, project: Optional[str] = None, suite_name: Optional[str] = None, total_cases: int = 0, logs_path: Optional[str] = None, )

ctags.name: finalize_test_run
ctags.signature: ( db: Session, run_id: int, status: str, passed: int, failed: int )

ctags.name: get_run_stats
ctags.pattern: /^def get_run_stats(db: Session, run_id: int) -> Optional[Tuple[int, int, int]]:$/
